\begingl[glneveryline={\EnglishGlossA,\EnglishGlossB}]
When[] the[] robe[] (-cloth)[] has[] been[] finished[] by[] a[] bhikkhu,[] when[] the[] kaá¹­hina[] (-frame-privileges)[] have[] been[] withdrawn,[] if[] out-of-season[] robe[] (-cloth)[] should[] become[] available[] to[] a[] bhikkhu,[] by[] a[] bhikkhu[] who[] is[] wishing[] (so,[] it)[] can[] be[] accepted;[] having[] accepted[] (it,[] it)[] is[] to[] be[] made[] very[] quickly.[]
